Question: Four days later, this person was involved in a second incident, when he flew for the only time with Chuck Yeager.
Hints: In a 2010 Space Foundation survey, this person was ranked as the #1 most popular space hero.
"That happened because this person was a team player, he always worked on behalf of the team.".
During the Apollo 11 launch, this person's heart reached a top rate of 110 beats per minute.
